name: Dark Sky Presentation mode
description:
A black theme showing nothing but the important stuff - for use on a permanent wall display.

You must set your location before applying the style, as the search box won't be visible. Be sure to use an autorefresh addon so the forecast doesn't get stale.
additional_info: Work In Progress. Latest - Revision 5: save space up top, and hide scrollbar Inline comments. Headers and footers are hidden, along with the map. The goal is to fit everything on one screen, so a scrollbar doesn't show. As such, the day-by-day descriptions are hidden as well. Title text is much larger, along with accompanying Skycon (weather icon). This is to be used along with a browser zoom, such that the timeline is the width of the screen. Details bar (atmospheric pressure, etc.) has been removed to make space The timeline temperatures no longer fade with the hours, as the darkest ones were too hard to see on some displays.
